summary: Admin panel with VM status management and customer support chat
architectural_notes: Admin panel with client VM status management
Real-time chat system between customers and administrators
User profile display in admin interface

existing_features.title: Add VM status edit controls in the admin panel for each client in the client list
Display VM status indicator on the client dashboard showing their current VM state
Implement a floating chat button and chat window widget on the client dashboard
Add a chat management interface in the admin panel showing all active client conversations
Display the logged-in administrator's name/profile in the admin panel header

new_feature_requests.summary: Add VM status indicator (online/offline/maintenance) for each client, editable in admin panel
Add floating chat widget for customers to contact support/admin
Display logged-in user profile name in admin panel
Add a VM status field to each client record that can be set to 'online', 'offline', or 'maintenance'
Create backend data structures and functions to store and retrieve chat messages between clients and administrators
